posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EconomicJusticeWarrior
posts.text: It is morally reprehensible that in the wealthiest nation in the world, millions of Americans are forced to live in poverty while billionaires reap unprecedented profits. We must demand a living wage of at least 15 dollars an hour, a wealth tax to redistribute the riches of the ultra-rich, and a comprehensive plan to eradicate poverty once and for all.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: SocialistSavant3000

Anything less is a tacit endorsement of the status quo of economic apartheid.
